archimate:Requirement.name: TS.2.1.1a: a) protect the confidentiality of sensitive information or information that is subject to legal and regulatory-related encryption requirements (e.g. PCI DSS, US Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA) and the EU General Data Protection Regulation 2016/679 (GDPR))
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
